name: MagicNumber
0:
”Alexa, launch Magic Number”
”Alexa, play Magic Number”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: magic number
des:
Alexa will ask you to choose any number between 1 and 10 (But remember not to tell her what you chose). She will then ask you to add and subtract 3 numbers from your secret number. 

At the end, Alexa will use the secret number you chose to work out what number you are currently thinking of. 

Give it a try!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
